text: `rand()` by default only gives you numbers in the range `[0, 1)`.  you need to transform it to get numbers in a different range

text:
There's also Distributions.jl which have a Uniform distribution defined

rand(Uniform(5, 7), 100)

which produces a 100-element array with uniformly random numbers from 5 to 7

But I don't know if there's any significant overhead to that compared to doing it yourself. In case you're producing lots of random numbers repeatedly
